name: Dungeon Dweller
description:
Dungeon Dweller is a roguelike game for 7DRL 2019.

Features
  • Turn-based gameplay
  • 40+ playable monsters
  • 50+ skills and 50+ items
Controls
  • Numpad keys - Move or melee attack
  • Space - Interact with the current tile or wait a turn
  • i - Open inventory (d to drop, t to throw)
  • s - Open skill book (qwer to assign shortcuts)
  • F1 - Help
